node.title: Woman Rejects Attempted Kiss From O.J. Simpson in Viral Video
node.alt: A clip of a woman rejecting an attempted kiss from O.J. Simpson went viral on TikTok with more than 1.6 million views since it was posted over the weekend. The incident occurred at a bar in Las Vegas, Nevada.
node.description: "She dodged that kiss like he was dodging that case," one commenter said of the former Heisman Trophy-winning runningback.
node.content:
["A woman recently went viral after posting a video of O.J. Simpson being quickly rejected after attempting to kiss her.", "The video, posted by @mackenziegd1998 on TikTok, immediately received attention and has amassed more than 1.6 million views and 8,500 comments since it was posted over the weekend.", "In the video, a young blonde woman leaned back and started dancing in her chair with Simpson.", "\"Wait till the end,\" the text on the video read.", "The clip was taken at a bar in Las Vegas, Nevada, and showed Simpson start dancing very close to the woman but she seemed to be having a great time.", "\"O.J. baby, he's out,\" she yelled in the video with a smile before she pointed at Simpson and looked up toward him.", "That's when Simpson leaned in toward her and attempted to kiss her. She quickly rejected his attempt by moving her entire body forward. She immediately looked at the camera with a nervous face and began laughing.", "\"He saw that blonde hair and started having flashbacks,\" one user wrote in the comments and received more than 28,000 likes.", "Other users were quick to crack jokes and drop puns in the comments related to Simpson's colorful history.", "\"He took a stab at it but missed this time,\" one user joked.", "\"She dodged that kiss like he was dodging that case,\" another user commented.", "Simpson has not shied away from the public eye since he was famously acquitted for his ex-wife's murder.", "In 1995, Simpson was put on trial for the fatal stabbings of his ex-wife Nicole Brown and a friend Ron Goldman. Simpson was found not guilty of the two murders but he was later found guilty in a civil lawsuit filed against Goldman's family.", "He was later arrested in Las Vegas in 2007 for various felonies including kidnapping and armed robbery. He was sentenced to 23 years in prison but was granted parole in 2017. Simpson is currently free but remains under probation until September 2022.", "", "
A clip of a woman rejecting an attempted kiss from O.J. Simpson went viral on TikTok with more than 1.6 million views since it was posted over the weekend. The incident occurred at a bar in Las Vegas, Nevada.
", "Earlier this month, Simpson was back in the news after Caitlyn Jenner claimed that he told Brown that he would one day kill her and be able to get away with it.", "During her time on the Australian reality show Big Brother VIP, Jenner made allegations that she believed he was guilty of murdering Brown.", "\"Obviously he did it and he got away with it,\" she said on the show. \"At one point he even told Nicole, 'I'll kill you and get away with it because I'm O.J. Simpson.'\""]
